ocr_qa.question: What is the name of the room adjacent to the KITCHEN on the right?
What is the minimum clearance specified between the coats room to the stairs?

spatial_qa.question: What is the name of the room located next to the DINING area on the right?
evidence: The room immediately right of DINING is labeled KITCHEN.

spatial_qa.question: Which room gives direct access to the stairs to the upper level?
evidence: The stairs are located in the LIVING ROOM

spatial_qa.question: Which room provides direct access to the 3'x4' back stoop?
evidence: The mudroom has a door that leads to the 3'x4' back stoop

comparison_qa.question: Which space has the largest area?
evidence: LIVING ROOM occupies the entire lower half of the plan

comparison_qa.question: Which room has more space? the WC or the MUDROOM?
evidence: The MUDROOM has more space than the WC.

counting_qa.question: How many toilets (W.C) does the floor plan have?
evidence: The floor plan has just one toilet (W.C)
